state_analysis: Despite adding the Cloudflare DNS server (1.1.1.1) to /etc/resolv.conf, the curl command is still returning a DNS resolution error. This indicates that the issue is likely not isolated to the DNS resolver settings, as the container is unable to resolve any external domains using curl.
explanation: I will attempt to directly access a known IP address using curl to see if the problem is isolated to DNS resolution or if there is a broader networking issue. I will use the IP address of example.com (93.184.216.34) directly with curl to check for connectivity.
